Source: Need help accessing DLC? Visit the in-game Tutorials for detailed information on how to get in and play.
Crown Store Soul Gems can be given priority over regular in-game Soul Gems by toggling the Default Soul Gem setting in the Gameplay submenu of your Options.

Battlegrounds are fast and deadly matches between three teams of four players each, open only to characters above Level 10. You can queue up for a Battleground in the Activity Finder, found in your main menu.
